ActivityMetadata.Name: GH List pull requests associated with a commit
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH List pull requests associated with a commit
ActivityMetadata.Description: Lists all pull requests containing the provided commit SHA, which can be from any point in the commit history. The results will include open and closed pull requests. Additional preview headers may be required to see certain details for associated pull requests, such as whether a pull request is in a draft state. For more information about previews that might affect this endpoint, see the [List pull requests](https://developer.github.com/v3/pulls/#list-pull-requests) endpoint.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

List pull requests associated with a commit

Lists all pull requests containing the provided commit SHA, which can be from any point in the commit history. The results will include open and closed pull requests. Additional preview headers may be required to see certain details for associated pull requests, such as whether a pull request is in a draft state. For more information about previews that might affect this endpoint, see the [List pull requests](https://developer.github.com/v3/pulls/#list-pull-requests) endpoint.

Method: Get

OperationID: repos/list-pull-requests-associated-with-commit

EndPoint:

/repos/{owner}/{repo}/commits/{commit_sha}/pulls
